inclusion.criterion: ventricular septal defect (VSD) repair at least 6 months before study enrolment
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No discrimination in type of VSD repair will be made (percutaneous or surgical)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must be able to perform exercise testing
inclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of atrial septal defect repair and pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to longstanding ASD, which may be a contraindication for the study.
